00030 #ifndef PDECONVERGENCETESTER_HPP_
00031 #define PDECONVERGENCETESTER_HPP_
00032 
00033 #include "AbstractConvergenceTester.hpp"
00034 
00035 template<class CELL, class CARDIAC_PROBLEM, unsigned DIM, unsigned PROBLEM_DIM>
00036 class PdeConvergenceTester : public AbstractConvergenceTester<CELL, CARDIAC_PROBLEM, DIM, PROBLEM_DIM>
00037 {
00038 public:
00039     void SetInitialConvergenceParameters()
00040     {
00041         this->PdeTimeStep = 0.04;
00042         this->OdeTimeStep = 0.0025;
00043     }
00044     void UpdateConvergenceParameters()
00045     {
00046         this->PdeTimeStep *= 0.5;
00047     }
00048     bool GiveUpConvergence()
00049     {
00050         return this->PdeTimeStep<=1e-8;
00051     }
00052     double Abscissa()
00053     {
00054         return this->PdeTimeStep;
00055     }
00056 };
00057 #endif /*PDECONVERGENCETESTER_HPP_*/
